parameter.value: This is a remarkable island. Its inhabitants are friendly and peaceful.
That's the local tanner. I heard he sells his leather to Rooster from Celeres.
My name is Rocky. Not really suitable for a sage, but I can't change it, right?
His Royal Highness is our great and just leader.
King Flantan is no more, I'm afraid.
Rooster is that fashion clothes seller from Celeres to whom Hercules sells his tanned leather.
Celeres used to be the capital, but King Arturo moved to Casteldine instead.
Casteldine is the capital of Lithaton. A grand city. I have been there.
Lithaton is the main continent in the far east.
I heard some witch from Lithaton was seeking it.
Greetings, adventurer. What brings you to my hut?
Farewell. May your journeys be safe, but adventurous.
